Another Bain/LOC photo of the indefatigable suffragist leader, "General" Rosalie Jones, on the march from NYC to Albany, New York [January 1, 1914]:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4690770664/in/photostream/]

More photos of the NYC-Albany suffragists' march:

comment._content: Surprises me of still exist photo about it !
